mapper.insert: insert into tbl_cn(cn_no, c_code, id, cn_title, cn_regdate, cn_content, cn_bold, cn_rchk) values (seq_cnno.nextval, #{c_code}, #{id}, #{cn_title}, sysdate, #{cn_content}, #{cn_bold}, #{cn_rchk})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tbl_cn.* from tbl_cn where c_code = #{c_code} order by cn_regdate desc) where rn between 1 and 4
select * from (select rownum rn, tbl_cn.* from tbl_cn where c_code = #{c_code} order by cn_regdate desc) where rn between (#{pageStart}+1) and (#{pageStart}+#{perPageNum})
mapper.update: update tbl_cn set cn_title = #{cn_title}, cn_content = #{cn_content}, cn_bold = #{cn_bold}, cn_rchk = #{cn_rchk} where cn_no = #{cn_no}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tbl_cnr.* from tbl_cnr where cnr_no = #{cnr_no} order by cnr_no) where rn between 1 and 10
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_cn where id = #{id} and c_code = #{c_code}
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_cn where c_code = #{c_code}
